sentences.sContent: I sat down in the dark hall with 600 other nervous kids and the lecturer booms out over the mic, “How do you get workers to work harder?
sentences.sContent_eng: I sat down in the dark hall with 600 other nervous kids and the lecturer booms out over the mic, “How do you get workers to work harder?
sentences.sCn: 我和其他600个紧张的孩子坐在暗暗的大厅，演讲者透过麦克风发出低沉的声音：“如何使员工们工作更努力？”

sentences.sContent: The mic of the phone is used as a sort of an open mic in a room that detects voices of all the speakers, identifies them and infers their emotions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mic of the phone is used as a sort of an open mic in a room that detects voices of all the speakers, identifies them and infers their emotions.
sentences.sCn: 在空间上，手机的麦克风是用来作为一个开放的麦克风，所有的扬声器声音检测，识别和推断出他们自己的情绪。
